ComicInfo.Summary: In the series finale, Gasolina and the amnesiac astronaut Bzoma travel to the original atomic bomb test site. Their search for answers uncovers what appears to be a male body in the desert. Nothing out of the ordinary, unless you consider the fact that the rotting carcass is over a mile long!
ComicInfo.Title: The Perpetual Evolution of the Self
